QuestData.Title: Roots'll Do 'Er
QuestData.Description: Look here, mate. She's on her last legs! If me bird dies, I'm as good as worthless.$B$BSo make yerself useful. Here on the peninsula you can dig up thorny stankroots. Oh the smell will knock you on yer patoot but steeped in water it'll boil up into a right powerful cure-all.$B$BGather some while I defend me bird. An' hurry! You Alliance wanks don't have a reputation for timely intervention, right?
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 8 Thorny Stankroots from the Twilight Shores.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, that's the stuff all right! Hope ya didn't eat any. Gives you the cramps something awful but it does wonders for birds.
